product_name: CycleOps PowerBeam Pro Bluetooth Smart Bike Trainer
long_description: A smooth magnetic trainer with a realistic road feel for serious cyclists, the PowerBeam Pro Bluetooth Smart Bike Trainer syncs up with your smartphone or tablet to offer speed and cadence values.
short_description: A smooth magnetic trainer with a realistic road feel for serious cyclists, the PowerBeam Pro Bluetooth Smart Bike Trainer syncs up with your smartphone or tablet to offer speed and cadence values.
